## Constitutional Compliance

- [ ] CHK001 Angular-First Architecture: Uses standalone components and Angular Signals
- [ ] CHK002 Type Safety: TypeScript strict mode enabled, all interfaces typed
- [ ] CHK003 Test-First Development: TDD followed, tests written before implementation
- [ ] CHK004 Performance & Scalability: OnPush strategy applied, lazy loading implemented
- [ ] CHK005 Accessibility & Standards: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance verified, semantic HTML used

## Code Quality

- [ ] CHK006 Angular CLI linting passes with no errors
- [ ] CHK007 SCSS styling with component encapsulation
- [ ] CHK008 File naming follows Angular Style Guide conventions
- [ ] CHK009 Security best practices implemented (input sanitization, route guards)

## Testing Requirements

- [ ] CHK010 Unit tests cover components and services (80% minimum coverage)
- [ ] CHK011 Integration tests for HTTP services with mocked dependencies
- [ ] CHK012 Signal state changes tested with Angular testing utilities
- [ ] CHK013 E2E tests for critical user journeys implemented
